comment: I took Professor Anthony for renaissance through modern art history class. She does amazing lectures and makes learning the content easy and even enjoyable. Although there are few assignments, so little for grades, she gives plenty of extra credit. The tests are somewhat hard, but she basically gives you exactly what to study.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Amazing lectures --Graded by few things

comment: She is great at explaining herself. Participation matters since it gives the answers to test questions. Gives several extra credits. Very understanding. I highly recommend plus shes funny.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: I took one of her online art history. It was a new thing for her and adopted someone elses course online so dates were off and it was difficult to know when things were due cause everything was dated differently. But a quiz every week w/ heavy reading and long PowerPoint lectures with 3 tests and 1 paper. Take VERY VERY good notes and youll pass

AWESOME PROF! She's clearly passionate about art history and makes the lectures interesting. I definitely walked out of this class liking art history a lot more than when I came in. There are 3 tests, one assignment, and plenty of extra credit. It was hard though bc anything she said during her lectures could be on the test, you really gotta study.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Amazing lectures

comment: While taking this class there were multiple issues with many of the online lectures where we could not access them until a few days before the quizzes. The written portion on tests were unclear and we were not given enough time to answer the question fully . Overall, professor Anthony seemed like a nice person but this class was a bit of a mess. :(

Professor Anthony understands that most people are taking the class as a general education requirement, you're not expected to be interested in art. However, most of her lectures are fairly entertaining since a lot of it is learning about history or cultures. It's not necessary to read the book if you pay attention in class, but it certainly helps.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: I took her in 2019 before covid. She's actually understanding, will help you if you ask and the testing isn't that bad. It's art history, you're not really drawing and it's mostly boring facts. However, she makes the history seemed fun & she keeps everyone engaged.
easy class, tests were hard because they were so specific about the artwork

She is a good professor and really cares about her students. She wants everyone to do their best and gives a couple extra credit opportunities that are very easy. Only 3 test including final. She takes attendance and make sure you don't leave without signing it even if she says you can go. Just take good notes on all the pictures and study.

This is a very easy class and she's a very easy professor. Solid choice if you just need to get your gen ed appreciation class out of the way. If you show up to class and pay basic attention, you'll hear all you need to know. No need to do the extra readings she posts. The tests are all multiple choice but sometimes given in a weird format.
Such a great professor! She says you need the book, but if you show up and take good notes you can still get an A without it.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Mrs. Anthony is very nice and super passionate about art. The class is test heavy, so attending class is important because all the details of the test comes from class, and she takes off 5 points of the final grade if you miss more than 3 classes. If you need to take a core class for KSU, this class is an easy and solid choice to get an A.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Prof Anthony is WONDERFUL. She is super sweet and very passionate about what she's teaching. Her tests are pretty difficult (very detail-oriented) but if you come to class and take notes, you'll be just fine.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT--LECTURE HEAVY
